meanings.definition: Consisting of five parts or members.
meanings.sent1: The flower had a pentamerous structure with five petals.
meanings.sent2: The starfish is a pentamerous creature with five arms.
meanings.sent3: The pentamerous puzzle was challenging to solve.
meanings.sent4: Her pentamerous necklace symbolized unity and balance.
meanings.sent5: The pentamerous design on the flag was striking and unique.

meanings.sent1: The pentamerous candles on the cake looked festive.
meanings.sent2: The pentamerous chairs were set up in a circular arrangement.
meanings.sent3: The pentamerous books on the shelf formed a neat pattern.
meanings.sent4: The pentamerous stars in the sky sparkled brightly.
meanings.sent5: The pentamerous flags fluttered in the wind at the parade.

meanings.definition: Having five similar parts or segments.
meanings.sent1: The pentamerous fruit had a sweet taste.
meanings.sent2: The pentamerous fingers on the glove provided a snug fit.
meanings.sent3: The pentamerous sections of the pie were evenly sliced.
meanings.sent4: The pentamerous petals of the flower bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The pentamerous legs of the table ensured stability.
